pr_title: SONARJAVA-3447 FN on S2259 when a method is annotated with spring's annotation @Nullable

timeline.message: SONARJAVA-3447 FN on S2259 when a method is annotated with spring's annotation @Nullable

timeline.bodyText: you can avoid calling two times syntaxNode.symbol().metadata() by storing it first.
timeline.author: m-g-sonar

timeline.bodyText:
In fact, I think we should rather rely on the NullnessAnnotationUtils class here, and move this method there.
There is already a list of nullable annotations, and I believe we should do another pass on the Nullable annotations list, to check if some of them are in fact strong nullness constraints (a la javax CheckForNull), and not weak (a la javax Nullable), to be used in such context.
timeline.author: m-g-sonar
